did.unittitle: Xavier University Department of Mathematics records
did.abstract: This small collection of documents includes minutes and other documents that reflect activity in the Xavier University Department of Mathematics during its existence (1955-1988). In 1988 a new department, the Department of Mathematics and Computer Science arose and is in existence to this day.

bioghist.head: History of Xavier University Department of Mathematics
bioghist.p: From 11/4/1946 to 3/31/1955 the department was known as the Department of Physics and Mathematics. In March, 1955 this department split into two different departments: the Department of Physics and the Department of Mathematics. The Department of Physics exists to this day. The Department of Mathematics became a new department in 1988: the Department of Mathematics and Computer Science.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection reflects the activity of the Department of Mathematics during its existence, 1955 to 1988.

arrangement.head: Statement of Arrangement
